document_data.caption: Hyaline crystals.
document_data.name: Hyaline
document_data.mainbody: '''Hyaline''' was a milky or white form of [[wikipedia:en:quartz|quartz]]
document_data.Description: The milkiness of these [[ornamental stones]] was caused by tiny droplets of water or carbon dioxide trapped in the crystals. Some specimens contained flecks of [[gold]].
document_data.Powers: Hyaline was sensitive to [[magic]] and would give off a blue glow whenever magic was activated, triggered, cast, or passed within 20 feet (6.1 meters) of a hyaline gem.
